alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:25PM CDT until June 06 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Franklin County in west central Arkansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Wiederkehr Village, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Altus... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Alix... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 35 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
